title: Vitrinne
description:
Complete and autonomous development of app and website from conception to publishing. 
Frontend and backend using JavaScript, Node.js, React, and React Native.
Mobile development with Android Studio and XCODE.
App publishing on Apple Store (iOS) and Play Store (Android).
Management and deployment of all system stages, including image storage (Firebase Storage), SQL database, backend, and frontend.
Integration with relational databases and Firebase.
Version control using Git and build management for Android/iOS.

title: Info Sistemas
description:
Web development using Typescript, Javascript, Node JS, and Angular. 
Mobile development with Flutter and Android Studio.
System deployment on company servers using PM2 and WinSCP.
SQL database manipulation in Microsoft SQL Server and general backend queries.
Version control with GIT in Microsoft Azure environment.
Teamwork experience and agile development methodology (Scrum).

title: Hodel Technology
description:
Development using the reactive Javascript library Lemonade JS, along with Node JS, J Suites, and vanilla Javascript. 
PostgreSQL handling. 
Documentation writing for the Lemonade JS reactive library.
Version control using GIT.

title: Oxe Desenvolvimentos
description:
Development with React JS, Node JS, React Native. 
MongoDB handling and use of Styled-Components. 
Prototype development using Figma.
Documentation including requirement documents, data dictionary, and various diagrams (ERD, Logical, Conceptual, etc). 
Version control tools used: GitHub and Bitbucket.

title: Império Software
description:
Mobile development using Android Studio. 
Version control with GitHub and Bitbucket. 
Technical support for software and hardware.
